Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Migrations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.vertx.core.Verticle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MigrationsImpl
    public interface Migrations
extends io.vertx.core.Verticle
    The migrations service performs database migrations on Mongo, using a mongo document as a lock.

        MigrationResponse add​(MigrationRequest request)
        Adds a given up and down function to a specific version.

        Returns:

MigrationToResponse migrateTo​(MigrateToRequest request)
                       throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        A migration request.
        Parameters:
        request - A version to migrate up or down to, or a request to migrate to the latest version.
        Returns:
